name: General Knowledge Trivia Game | Mixed  5 Questions | 5 Questions

questions.text: How many planets were believed to exist in our solar system at the end of the twentieth century?
questions.explanation:
9.

	There were nine planets in our solar system, however in 2006 Pluto was downgraded to a dwarf planet of the Kuiper Belt.

questions.text: What was the first empire to use aqueducts?
questions.explanation:
Babylonian.

	Many people think the Romans were the first to use aqueducts but they were in evidence in the ancient civilizations of Mesopotamia long before Rome was even built.

questions.text: Which of these American wars was against Great Britain?
questions.explanation:
Revolutionary War.

	Since that time the US and the UK have improved relations.

questions.text: What Indian tribe did the colonists disguise themselves as in the Boston Tea Party?
questions.explanation:
Mohawk.

	The colonists disguised themselves as Mohawk Indians to disguise their faces and as a symbolic choice.

questions.text: How many bones are in your ear?
questions.explanation:
3.

	The hammer, anvil and the stirrup are the three bones in the ear.
